Class RightAngle2DShapes

  • java.lang.Object
    • Shapes
      • TwoDimensionalShapes
        • RightAngle2DShapes
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Rectangle

    public class RightAngle2DShapes
extends TwoDimensionalShapes
    Version:
    1.0

    This is a subclass of TwoDimensionalShapes. This class will contain shapes with right angles. All right angled shapes will have an area of just multiplying the base and its height. The perimeter will be the total of two times the base plus two times the height. As all right angled shapes can only contain four sides.

    Author:
    Alex Wong wong4a@gmail.com

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private double base
      The length of the base.
      private double height
      The length of the height.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RightAngle2DShapes()
      This will set the edges to be four when another class inherits this class it would only have right angles therefore it can only have exactly four edges.

        public void calcArea()
